items.name: TC_55!017 | Sign up/log in/forms or the transition to the trading platform are not opened after clicking the [Try now] button in 'Why choose Capital.com?..' Block in the menu item [Our Mobile Apps]
TC_55!031 | Testing link [Learn more about us] on the block 'Contents'

TC_55!265 | Testing button [Open an account] in 'We’re here to help' block on the 'Trading platforms' page
TC_55!300 | Testing button [Explore features] on the 'Web platform' page
TC_55!324 | The text of the menu item [Demo] of the menu title [Trading tools] in the menu section [Trading] is not displayed in the header when AR language is selected
TC_55!357 | Menu section [Trading] > Menu item [Spread betting] > The widget of the block 'Our spread betting markets' > Click on the button [Commodities]

TC_55!272 | The page with “404 error” message is displayed after clicking the link [تعلّم التداول] (Learn to trade) in the tile  [تبدأ الطريق من أوله؟] (Starting from the beginning?) on the page "تعلّم التداول" (Learn to trade) when AR language is selected

TC_55!273 | The page with “404 error” message is displayed after clicking the link [تعلّم التداول] (Learn to trade) in the tile [ترغب في تحسين استراتيجياتك؟] (Looking to sharpen your strategies?) on the page "تعلّم التداول" (Learn to trade) when AR language is selected
TC_55!305 | Error message is displayed after clicking the link "أكثر" (More) in the tile "العملات المشفرة" (Cryptocurrencies) on the page "تجريبي" (Demo) when AR language and SCA license is selected
